Sentencas: A few compositions of Bi2O3-doped calcia stabilized zirconia (Zr0.88-xBixCa0.12O2-delta; x = 0.0, 0.02, 0.05, 0.10) were prepared via solid state reaction route.
Titulo: Influence of Bi2O3 additive on the electrical conductivity of calcia stabilized zirconia solid electrolyte

Sentencas: Addition of Bi2O3 decreased the sintering temperature of calcia stabilized zirconia (CSZ) and also augmented the growth of zirconia grains.
Titulo: Influence of Bi2O3 additive on the electrical conductivity of calcia stabilized zirconia solid electrolyte

Sentencas: Dense ceramic systems were formed in a temperature range of 1200-1300 degrees C. X-ray Rietveld refinement analysis of the system revealed the formation of cubic zirconia phase at room temperature.
Titulo: Influence of Bi2O3 additive on the electrical conductivity of calcia stabilized zirconia solid electrolyte

Sentencas: Microstructural studies of the sintered pellet depicted highly dense grain morphology.
Titulo: Influence of Bi2O3 additive on the electrical conductivity of calcia stabilized zirconia solid electrolyte

Sentencas: XPS spectra of the compositions confirmed the elemental confinements and various characteristic valence states of the constituents.
Titulo: Influence of Bi2O3 additive on the electrical conductivity of calcia stabilized zirconia solid electrolyte

Sentencas: Thermal expansion coefficient of the Bi2O3 doped CSZ system was found to be compatible with the other components of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Influence of Bi2O3 additive on the electrical conductivity of calcia stabilized zirconia solid electrolyte

Sentencas: Furthermore, conductivity analysis evidenced an Arrhenius type thermally activated ionic conduction above 300 degrees C.
Titulo: Influence of Bi2O3 additive on the electrical conductivity of calcia stabilized zirconia solid electrolyte

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of the system was found to increase with bismuth content up to x = 0.05, thereafter decreased due to less solubility of Bi3+ into zirconia matrix.
Titulo: Influence of Bi2O3 additive on the electrical conductivity of calcia stabilized zirconia solid electrolyte

Sentencas: A high conductivity similar to 0.019 S cm(-1) was achieved for 5 mol% Bi2O3 calcia-codoped cubic zirconia system at 760 degrees C. Thus, cost effective bismuth codoped calcia stabilized zirconia might be a possible alternative to yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ), due to its ionic conductivity comparable to that of the YSZ.
Titulo: Influence of Bi2O3 additive on the electrical conductivity of calcia stabilized zirconia solid electrolyte
